official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the 200th anniversary of the encampment of the American Army during the bitter winter at Valley Forge.

summary.text: Provides for the striking of medals commemorating the 200th anniversary of the encampment of the American Army during the winter at Valley Forge.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the 200th anniversary of the encampment of the American Army during the bitter winter at Valley Forge.
